hero.name: Muhammadov Shukurullo
hero.description: As a web developer and designer, I combine creativity and technology. I strive to create a user-friendly experience with each project. My goal is to contribute to the success of my clients through quality web projects.

about.informatsiya: Hello! I am Muhammadov Shukurullo, born in 2009 in the Naryn district of the Namangan region of the Republic of Uzbekistan. I am currently 16 years old and have been interested in technology since the 6th grade. This interest led me to the field of web programming.
about.informat: As a web developer, my main goal is to create modern, functional, and user-friendly websites and web applications. For me, programming is not just about writing code, but also about finding solutions to problems, using creativity, and developing a product that benefits users.
about.infor: I develop fast and reliable web projects primarily using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS technologies. I strive to strike the perfect balance between design and functionality in each of my projects.
about.inf: My goal is to further expand my knowledge and experience, learn new technologies and participate in international projects in the future.
about.title: SEO optimization
about.text: Promote your site to higher positions in search engines
about.text1: Elegance and great attention to detail in the design process
about.text2: Developing websites to high quality and modern standards
about.text3: Belgilangan vaqt ichida samarali va tezkor sayt yaratish

project.tajriba: During my 3 years of experience, I have created various frontend projects. Each project has been an opportunity to gain new experience and skills
